alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Huerfano; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued November 29 at 8:13AM MST until November 29 at 8:45AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Northeastern Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... West central Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... Central Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 845 AM MST. * At 813 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Pueblo Depot to near Avondale to 7 miles north of Greenhorn Mountain, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Locations impacted include... Southern Pueblo, Boone, Avondale, Pueblo Depot, Blende and Colorado City. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
